statements: SELECT * FROM Cultural_Exchange_Programs;
SELECT program_id, program_name FROM Cultural_Exchange_Programs WHERE coordinator_id = 5;
SELECT program_name, location, start_date FROM Cultural_Exchange_Programs ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Cultural_Exchange_Programs WHERE program_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT coordinator_id, COUNT(*) AS program_count FROM Cultural_Exchange_Programs GROUP BY coordinator_id HAVING program_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM Cultural_Exchange_Programs WHERE program_id = 1;
SELECT program_name, location FROM Cultural_Exchange_Programs WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Cultural_Exchange_Programs WHERE coordinator_id = 100 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT program_id, program_name, location FROM Cultural_Exchange_Programs WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_programs, location FROM Cultural_Exchange_Programs GROUP BY location ORDER BY total_programs DESC;
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE age > 25;
SELECT participant_name, nationality FROM participants;
SELECT * FROM programs WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM programs WHERE coordinator_id = 3;
SELECT participant_name, age FROM participants WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE nationality='USA'
SELECT participant_name, age FROM participants WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM programs WHERE coordinator_id=10 ORDER BY start_date
SELECT * FROM participants JOIN programs ON participants.participant_id = programs.coordinator_id WHERE participants.age < 25
SELECT nationality, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM participants GROUP BY nationality HAVING total_count > 1 ORDER BY total_count DESC
SELECT * FROM ExchangePrograms;
SELECT program_name, program_type FROM ExchangePrograms WHERE program_location = 'France';
SELECT program_name, program_date FROM ExchangePrograms ORDER BY program_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Participants WHERE participant_country = 'USA';
SELECT coordinator_name, coordinator_email FROM Coordinators ORDER BY coordinator_name ASC;
SELECT program_name, program_type, program_location FROM ExchangePrograms ORDER BY program_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Participants WHERE participant_country = 'USA';
SELECT coordinator_name, coordinator_email, coordinator_department FROM Coordinators WHERE coordinator_department LIKE '%IT%';
SELECT program_name, program_type, program_location FROM ExchangePrograms WHERE program_type = 'Study Abroad' ORDER BY program_name ASC;
SELECT program_name, program_date FROM ExchangePrograms WHERE program_type = 'Internship' AND program_location = 'Spain';
SELECT * FROM exchange_programs;
SELECT program_name, program_location FROM exchange_programs;
SELECT program_name, program_start_date, program_end_date FROM exchange_programs ORDER BY program_start_date DESC;
SELECT program_id, program_name, program_location FROM exchange_programs WHERE program_location = 'Italy';
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE program_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM exchange_programs;
SELECT program_name, program_location FROM exchange_programs WHERE program_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM participants WHERE program_id = 1;
SELECT institution_name, country FROM host_institutions ORDER BY country DESC;
SELECT coordinator_name, coordinator_email FROM coordinators WHERE program_id = 2 ORDER BY coordinator_name;
SELECT * FROM cultural_exchange_programs;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM cultural_exchange_programs WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT coordinator_name, coordinator_email FROM coordinators ORDER BY coordinator_name ASC;
SELECT participant_name, nationality, age FROM participants WHERE age >= 25 AND nationality = 'USA';
SELECT activity_name, activity_date FROM activities WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM cultural_exchange_programs ORDER BY program_name DESC;
SELECT participant_name, nationality FROM participants WHERE age > 30 AND program_id = 1;
SELECT coordinator_name, coordinator_email FROM coordinators WHERE coordinator_email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM cultural_exchange_programs WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
